title: Privacy Policy
content:
# PRIVACY POLICY

**Last Updated: {{EFFECTIVE_DATE}}**

{{BRAND_NAME}} ("Company," "we," "us," or "our") respects your privacy.
This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website(s), purchase our products, or interact with our services (collectively, the "Services").

By using the Services, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this Privacy Policy.

---

## 1. Information We Collect

### a) Personal Information You Provide

We may collect information you voluntarily provide, including:

- Name
- Email address
- Shipping and billing address
- Phone number
- Payment information (processed securely by third-party payment processors)
- Account login credentials
- Reviews, testimonials, images, or other user-generated content
- Communications with customer support

### b) Automatically Collected Information

When you access the Services, we may automatically collect:

- IP address
- Browser type and device information
- Pages visited and interaction data
- Referring/exit URLs
- Date and time stamps
- Cookies and similar tracking technologies

### c) Health & Skin-Related Information (If Provided)

If you voluntarily provide information about:

- Skin type or concerns
- Product preferences or usage feedback

Such information is used solely to improve your experience and is not medical data.
We do not collect or store protected health information (PHI).

---

## 2. How We Use Your Information

We use collected information to:

- Process and fulfill orders
- Manage subscriptions and customer accounts
- Communicate regarding orders, updates, promotions, and support
- Improve our website, products, and customer experience
- Conduct analytics and performance tracking
- Prevent fraud and ensure security
- Comply with legal obligations

---

## 3. Cookies & Tracking Technologies

We use cookies, pixels, and similar technologies to:

- Enable site functionality
- Remember preferences
- Analyze traffic and usage patterns
- Deliver relevant advertisements

You may adjust cookie preferences through your browser settings. Disabling cookies may affect site functionality.

---

## 4. Sharing of Information

**We do not sell your personal information.**

We may share information with:

- Payment processors
- Shipping and fulfillment providers
- Marketing, analytics, and advertising partners
- Customer service platforms
- Legal or regulatory authorities when required

All service providers are contractually obligated to protect your data and use it only for authorized purposes.

---

## 5. Advertising & Analytics

We may work with third-party partners (e.g., analytics and advertising platforms) to:

- Measure performance
- Deliver personalized ads
- Track conversion events

These partners may use cookies or similar technologies in accordance with their own privacy policies.

---

## 6. Email & Marketing Communications

By providing your email, you consent to receive:

- Transactional communications
- Promotional messages (you may opt out at any time)

You can unsubscribe via the link in our emails or by contacting customer support.

---

## 7. User-Generated Content

If you submit reviews, photos, or testimonials:

- You grant us the right to use this content for marketing and promotional purposes
- Personal information included in such content may be visible publicly

---

## 8. Data Retention

We retain personal information only as long as necessary to:

- Provide the Services
- Fulfill legal, accounting, or reporting requirements
- Resolve disputes and enforce agreements

---

## 9. Data Security

We implement reasonable administrative, technical, and physical safeguards to protect your information.

However, no method of transmission or storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

---

## 10. Your Privacy Rights

Depending on your location, you may have rights to:

- Access your personal data
- Correct or update information
- Request deletion of your data
- Opt out of marketing communications
- Restrict or object to certain processing activities

Requests can be made by contacting us using the information below.

---

## 11. California Privacy Rights (CPRA)

California residents may have additional rights, including:

- The right to know what personal data is collected
- The right to request deletion
- The right to opt out of certain data sharing

We do not sell personal data as defined under California law.

---

## 12. European Union / UK (GDPR)

If you are located in the EU or UK:

- Our lawful bases include consent, contract necessity, and legitimate interests
- You have the right to lodge a complaint with your local data protection authority

---

## 13. Children's Privacy

Our Services are not intended for individuals under the age of 18.
We do not knowingly collect personal information from children.

---

## 14. Third-Party Links

Our website may contain links to third-party sites.
We are not responsible for the privacy practices of those websites.

---

## 15. Changes to This Privacy Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time.
Changes will be posted on this page with an updated "Last Updated" date.

---

## 16. Contact Us

If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or your data, contact:

Email: {{CONTACT_EMAIL}}
Address: {{CONTACT_ADDRESS}}
